NonXMLResume.TextResume:
NATIONAL INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY, DURGAPUR MAHATMA GANDHI AVENUE, DURGAPUR- 713209
CURRICULUM VITAE
1. PERSONAL DETAILS:
Name: Sabyasachi Ghosh ❖ Date of Birth: 06/01/1999 Guardian's Name: Rupak Kumar Ghosh ❖ Branch / Specialization: Computer Science and Engineering Registration No: 16U10444 ❖ OP / SC/ ST/ OBC / PWD: OBC Male/Female: Male ❖ Present Address: Room No - 246, Hall - 4, NIT Durgapur, Mahatma Gandhi Rd, Durgapur, WB - 713 209 ❖ Address for Correspondence: Room No - 246, Hall - 4, NIT Durgapur,
Mahatma Gandhi Rd, Durgapur, WB - 713 209 ❖ E-Mail Id: sabyasachi9733@gmail.com Cell No: +91 7908322206
2. EDUCATIONAL QUALIFICATIONS:
2.1 Secondary & Higher Secondary:
Year of Marks Examination Board Passing Obtained Out of % (Total) 10th STD WBBSE 2014 641 700 91.57
12th STD WBCHSE 2016 475 500 95.00
2.2 Graduation:
SEM 1 2 3 4 5 6 SGPA 7.80 7.68 7.64 7.18 8.27 8.55 CGPA 7.80 7.74 7.71 7.59 7.72 7.85
3. Scholastic Achievements:
❖ Ranked 18th among more than 750, 000 candidates in state in Higher Secondary Examination (10+2). ❖ Topped from school in Higher Secondary Examination and secured 5th rank in district. ❖ Topped from school in Secondary Examination. ❖ Ranked 1st in district in National Means Cum Merit Scholarship, West Bengal(2011). ❖ Secured 1st rank in Zone in Science Aptitude Test organized by Paschim Banga Vigyan Mancha, 2013.
4. Skills:
❖ Proficient In: C, C++, Git, DBMS ❖ Familiar With: Linux, JavaScript, Bootstrap, CSS, PHP and MySQL, Data Structures and Algorithms
6. Strength & Weakness:
❖ Strength: Enthusiasm, dedication and determination for work.
❖ Weakness: Too much honest
7. Projects:
❖ An optimization approach for common content distribution in Adhoc network using JAYA algorithm under the guidance of Dr. Parag Kumar Guhathakurta, NIT Durgapur.
❖ Personal projects like a web extension to find out the meaning of a word from a website, an automated script to send messages through Whatsapp Web from terminal to a particular person at a scheduled time.
8. Internship:
❖ Summer research internship in NIT Durgapur(2019) under the guidance of Dr. Parag Kumar Guhathakurta. ❖ Worked as a Freelancer at RandomBoyz.com
9. Scholarship Received:
❖ Received National Means Cum Merit Scholarship (2011 - 2014). ❖ Uttarbanga Sambad Suhas Chandra Talukdar Scholarship (2014) ❖ Received WBMCM Scholarship (2016 - Present).
10. Extracurricular Activities:
❖ Stood first in Zone in Essay Writing Competition organized by ABTA, 2013
I hereby declare that the information given above is true and correct.
DATED: The 1st of July, 2019. SIGNATURE:

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: Sabyasachi Ghosh's experience appears to be mostly concentrated in Information Technology (mostly Programming) and slightly concentrated in Engineering (mostly General Engineering). Sabyasachi Ghosh's experience appears to be entry level, with 11 months of experience.
